thread.title: Four people sent to hospital in Amherstburg crash
thread.title_full: Four people sent to hospital in Amherstburg crash

author: cbc
title: Four people sent to hospital in Amherstburg crash
text:
A fiery single-vehicle crash in Amherstburg on Monday afternoon sent four people to hospital with injuries, say fire fighters.
The vehicle went off the roadin the 4700 block of 4th Concession North just before 4 p.m. Smoke continued to rise from the vehicle as the town's fire fighters put out the flames.
All four passengers were transported to hospital, but the extent of their injuries is not known at this time.
AFD on scene of MVA in 4700 block of 4th Concession North. Vehicle on fire, all passengers are out of the vehicle
